    Class QueryAsyncValidationDecorator<TFilter, TResult>

    Decorates an asynchronous query handler to include validation before handling the query.

    Inheritance

    Syntax
    public sealed class QueryAsyncValidationDecorator<TFilter, TResult> : IAsyncQueryHandler<TFilter, TResult> where TFilter : IFilter where TResult : class
    Type Parameters
    Name Description
    TFilter

    The type of filter for the query.
    TResult
